mapper.insert: insert into companybankinfo (id, bankname, accountname, banknumber, bankforkname) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banknumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankforkname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, bankname, accountname, banknumber, bankforkname from companybankinfo LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
